name: Billlie - The Billage of Perception : Chapter One
detail: The debut mini album by Billlie. It was released on November 10, 2021 with Ring x Ring serving as the album's title track.

name: Billlie - The Collective Soul and Unconscious: Chapter One
detail: The second mini album by Billlie. It was released on February 23, 2022 with GingaMingaYo (the strange world) serving as the album's title track.

name: Weeekly - We Are
detail: The first mini album by Weeekly. It was released on June 30, 2020 with Tag Me (@Me) serving as the title track.

name: Weeekly - We Can
detail: The second mini album by Weeekly. It was released on October 13, 2020 with the song Zig Zag serving as the album's title track.

name: Weeekly - We Play
detail: The third mini album by Weeekly. It was released on March 17, 2021 with After School serving as the album's title track.

name: Weeekly - Play Game: Holiday
detail: The fourth mini album by Weeekly. It was released on August 4, 2021 with Holiday Party serving as the album's title track.

name: Weeekly - Play Game: Awake
detail: The first single album by Weeekly. It was released on March 7, 2022 with Ven Para serving as the album's title track.

name: StayC - Star To A Young Culture
detail: The debut single album by STAYC. It was released on November 12, 2020 with the song So Bad serving as the album's title track.

name: StayC - Staydom
detail: The second single album by STAYC. It was released on April 8, 2021 with ASAP serving as the album's title track.

name: StayC - Stereotype
detail: The first mini album by STAYC. It was released on September 6, 2021 with Stereotype serving as the album's title track.

name: StayC - Young-Luv.com
detail: The second mini album by STAYC. It was released on February 21, 2022 with Run2U serving as the album's title track.

name: Ikon - Flashback
detail: The fourth mini album by iKON. It was released on May 3, 2022 with But You serving as the album's title track.

name: Astro - Drive to the Starry Road
detail: The third full-length album by ASTRO. It was released on May 16, 2022 with Candy Sugar Pop serving as the album's title track.

name: TXT - Minisode 2: Thursday's Child
detail: The fourth mini album by TXT. It was released on May 9, 2022 with Good Boy Gone Bad serving as the album's title track.

name: Seventeen - Attacca
detail: The ninth mini album by SEVENTEEN. It was released on October 22, 2021 with Rock with You serving as the album's title track.

name: Yena - ˣ‿ˣ (SMiLEY)
detail: The debut mini album by Yena. It was released on January 17, 2022 with Smiley serving as the album's title track.

name: Younha - End Theory: Final Edition
detail: A repackage of Younha's sixth full-length album End Theory. It was released on March 30, 2022 with Event Horizon serving as the album's title track.

name: Taeyeon - INVU
detail: The third full-length album by Taeyeon. It was released on February 14, 2022 with INVU serving as the album's title track.
